title: Bill Clinton Is Released From Hospital
sub_head: Former president had been hospitalized since Tuesday for a non-Covid-19 infection
body:
Former President Bill Clinton was released from a California hospital on Sunday after several days of treatment for a non-Covid-19 infection.
Mr. Clinton, 75 years old, exited UC Irvine Medical Center with his wife, former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton, at his side. He shook hands with doctors and staff as he left and waved and gave a thumbs-up to reporters outside the hospital.
